# GitHub Folder Prompt

This is a test prompt in the .github directory demonstrating multi-location support.

## Prompt

Test prompt located in the .github folder.

## Instructions

1. Verify prompt can be discovered from .github location
2. Ensure folder-based organization works correctly
3. Test cross-location file references

## Example Output

This demonstrates that prompts can be organized in multiple folders.
